nodes.text: Blue Three was the call sign of the third member of Blue Squadron. There were a number of starfighter squadrons with this name, and several pilots went by the call sign Blue Three.
During the Clone Wars, Blue Three was the call sign of clone trooper pilot Slammer, who was killed in the Battle of Ryloth.
Blue Three was the call sign of the Rebel Alliance's "Rookie One" when he flew with Blue Squadron in the Battle of Yavin.
The call sign was also used by an Imperial TIE pilot whose TIE bomber was shot down in the subjugation of Jabiim.
During the evacuation of Hoth, Rebel Alliance pilot Will Scotian flew as Blue Three.
In 12 ABY, Blue Three was the call sign of New Republic pilot Alexandra Winger prior to her capture by the Star Destroyer Judicator.
Blue Three is the call sign given to Biggs Darklighter in the novelization and comic adaptation of A New Hope. However, in the final film, he is identified as Red Three.
